section.p: To renounce the worship of Alvir and Valmir, you must pay 30 Shards in compensation to the priesthood. The priests advise you not to put to sea for a while after renouncing your initiate’s vows - ‘in case the gods are angered by your faithlessness.’

Do you want to reconsider?
If you are determined to renounce your faith, pay the 30 Shards and delete Alvir and Valmir from the God box on your Adventure Sheet.
